column1: Funeral services for Anna Lois Johnson Forrester Lipford will be conducted at 7:00 p.m. Friday
column3: 2015 from Charles B. Hux Memorial Chapel of Hux-Lipford Funeral Home with Rev. Harry Wills and Rev. David Bentley officiating. The family will receive friends from 5:00 � 7:00 p.m. prior to the funeral services. Graveside and interment will be held in Johnson Lipford Cemetery at 9:00 a.m. Sunday
column5: 2015. Active pallbearers will be Matthew Forrester
